directions.content: Click the answer with the correct subject adjective clause for each sentence. Click Submit to check your answers.

question.content: Athletes play sports. They have strong muscles.

option.content: An athlete is a person with strong muscles that plays sports.
An athlete is a person with strong muscles who plays sports.

question.content: A tow truck tows cars. It has a big engine.

option.content: A tow truck is a truck with a big engine that tows cars.
A tow truck is a truck with a big engine who tows cars.

question.content: My aunt is a teacher. She teaches second grade.

option.content: My aunt is a teacher that teaches second grade.
My aunt is a teacher who teaches second grade.

question.content: Tony is a cook. He prepares Italian meals.

option.content: Tony is a cook that prepares Italian meals.
Tony is a cook who prepares Italian meals.

question.content: A crane is a machine. It lifts building materials.

option.content: A crane is a machine that lifts building materials.
A crane is a machine who lifts building materials.
